That sounds like an amazing and unique combination! A BBQ chicken pizza with a spicy twist can work beautifully with a crispy crust. The spicy BBQ sauce will add a nice depth of flavor, while the grilled chicken, red onion, and cilantro will provide a nice texture and freshness. The crispy crust will provide a nice contrast to the soft, saucy toppings.

Here are a few suggestions to take your BBQ chicken pizza to the next level:

* **Spicy BBQ sauce**: Use a high-quality, spicy BBQ sauce that's not too sweet. You can also add some diced jalapeños or serrano peppers to the sauce for an extra kick.
* **Grilled chicken**: Marinate the chicken in a mixture of olive oil, lime juice, and your favorite spices before grilling it. This will add more flavor to the chicken and help it pair well with the spicy BBQ sauce.
* **Red onion**: Thinly slice the red onion and caramelize it before adding it to the pizza. This will bring out the natural sweetness of the onion and balance out the heat from the BBQ sauce.
* **Cilantro**: Add a sprinkle of fresh cilantro on top of the pizza for a burst of freshness. You can also mix some chopped cilantro into the BBQ sauce for added flavor.
* **Additional toppings**: Consider adding some crumbled bacon or diced bell peppers to the pizza for added smokiness and crunch.

To ensure the crispy crust pairs well with the toppings, make sure to:

* **Pre-bake the crust**: Pre-bake the crust for 2-3 minutes before adding the toppings. This will help the crust hold its shape and provide a crispy base for the toppings.
* **Balance the toppings**: Don't overload the pizza with toppings, as this can make the crust soggy. Balance the toppings to ensure the crust can hold its shape and cook evenly.

I think your BBQ chicken pizza with a spicy twist will be a huge hit! The crispy crust will provide a nice contrast to the soft, flavorful toppings, and the spicy BBQ sauce will add a nice kick. Good luck, and I hope it turns out amazing!
